channel.title: Error, and can't login
channel.description:
I have one error, and when I start the server I can't log in. Its just a black screen showing Lost connection- attempting to reconnect
In my 'runserver' it shows my chars connecting..
Error: [IMG]http://i14.tinypic.com/6ui2buu.jpg[/img]
Using testscape, Added god sword and a few npc drops and what it says in some interfaces.

item.title: Error, and can't login
item.dc:creator: @L_s_R L s R
item.description:
@L_s_R wrote:

item = 15333 Armadyl_Godsword A_beautiful,_heavy_sword. 30000 30000 30000 0 132 80 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 132 8 item = 15334 Bandos_Godsword A_brutally_heavy_sword. 30000 30000 30000 0 132 80 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 132 8 item = 15335 Saradomin_Godsword A_gracious,_heavy_sword. 30000 30000 30000 0 132 80 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 132 8 item = 15336 Armadyl_Godsword A_terrifying,_heavy_sword. 30000 30000 30000 0 132 80 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 132 8

At the very end…

Ahh…Something is wrong with the Bandos GS, But I cant figure it out XD
